translations: adj.药用的，有疗效的；有益身体健康的，有益心理健康的

sentences.sentence: He claims he keeps a bottle of brandy only for medicinal purposes.
sentences.translation: 他说他存放着一瓶白兰地只是为了药用。

sentences.sentence: He also had an invincible faith in the medicinal virtues of garlic.
sentences.translation: 他对大蒜的药用功效深信不疑。
人们发现了它们的药用价值。
